author: powercode
body:
Made the projects in PowerShell.sln build and run.

This makes it easier to develop and debug changes, even if it doesn't work for Linux/macOs.
Copying a powershell.version file and setting $env:devpath to src/vs-proj/bin/release before launching devenv make debugging work as expected from visual studio.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: We're moving to official msbuild support in .Net soon, so we won't be taking this PR.

title: Make csproj msbuild projects buildable.
